review.body:
Thanks to Wednesday Books for the free review copy. All opinions are my own.

I was so excited to review this book by Hahn because I loved You'd Be Mine last year, and I enjoyed this one just as much. She puts so many music references in this book that I just loved. I think it really adds to the expe

This is a collection of paranormal romance. the stories have shape shifters, secret babies and soul mates. These stories are all very exciting and full of action and adventure.

I received a free copy of this book via Booksprout and am voluntarily leaving a review.

book.title: The Southern Book Club's Guide to Slaying Vampires
book.title_without_series: The Southern Book Club's Guide to Slaying Vampires

review.body: Kept me on my toes. Loved the book.

Another great suspense/thriller! The Shadows starts off so strong it sucks you right in. The first scene is a child driving past a murder scene as the driver slows down to make sure the child gets a good look. It goes back and forth from past to present. I like this type of book because it gives ins

book.title: In Any Light (The Rowan Harbor Cycle, #6.5)
The Sixth Man (Sean King and Michelle Maxwell, #5)

review.body: Wow! I can't believe there is only one more in the awesome series!

Review:
This book was different from anything that I have ever read before. This was something I really liked about it, I had never read a dark romance with the same kind of plot line as this one which I found to be quite unique. Overall I would give this book 4/5 ⭐'s. I loved the characters and the

book.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Smoke and Shadow (Avatar: The Last Airbender, #4)
book.title_without_series: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Smoke and Shadow

review.body: Ahh the best one, so far. Gripping and satisfying.

book.title: Skeleton Knight in Another World, Light Novel Vol. 1 (Skeleton Knight in Another World [Light Novel], #1)
book.title_without_series: Skeleton Knight in Another World, Light Novel Vol. 1

review.body: Solid entertaining genre piece that kept me engaged but didn't really stand out in any memorable way.

book.title: A Young Savage Touched My Soul
book.title_without_series: A Young Savage Touched My Soul

review.body:
I loved it!!

I loved this story. Sincere was bae all day. I'm glad Sydney got her act right because she was delusional. This so cute that I wanted more. This was a great read.

I loved this story so much!! It’s a great addition to the forbidden series. Adrian and Stevie have amazing chemistry together. Even with the struggles they both have they manage to let love prevail and make it work. I can’t wait for the next book.

I received a free copy of this book via Booksprout an

book.title: MAGNUS: A BBW Panther Shifter Romance
book.title_without_series: MAGNUS: A BBW Panther Shifter Romance

review.body: When you meet your mate, the universe makes sense. Sen Magnus Callahan has taken on shifter rights for his agenda after coming out as a shifter. He recognizes the challenges, but he wants to help shifters find their mates. He wants to open up relationships between shifters and humans. Karen works wi

book.title: Brain on Fire: My Month of Madness
book.title_without_series: Brain on Fire: My Month of Madness

review.body: Scary that one day your feeling fine and then bam your life is on a tailspin of experiences beyond ones belief.
This was ... surprisingly engrossing. Some Deus ex machina stuff at times to move the plot forward but genuinely an interesting world to explore.

Murderbot goes to the place that made him what he is to find out what really happened. He meets some characters along the way that help him deepen his logical processes and give us more glimpses at his neuroses (my favorite parts). Again I find Murderbot incredibly hilarious and deeply relatable.

BOOK NAME: Sakthi- The Chosen Hexad
AUTHOR: Vignesh SV
FORMAT: Kindle
GENRE: Mythological Fiction

book.title: Montana Homecoming (The Wildes of Birch Bay Book 6)

review.body:
“I deserve love, Cord. True love. And I deserve happiness and a life filled with knowing that the man I choose to be with would walk through fire for me.”

Maggie is a woman who knows what she wants and she’s not going to settle for less. Cord on the other hand, has convinced himself he’s not capable
It was okay. Not my type of book due to one of the main characters dying. I rather have a happy ending.
